ingredients.ingredient: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into French fry-size pieces
coarse sea salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
coarse sea salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cut fries to uniform thickness for even cooking
Pat dry with paper towels before seasoning to promote crispiness
Toss halfway through baking for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What dipping sauces would complement these sweet potato fries?
